Index.title: Procure with confidence, VeriTrust backs you up
Index.description: We transformed the tender system, providing greater security, transparency and confidence in the contracting process.
Index.marketplace_description: Facilitates the search and promotion of opportunities, ensuring a transparent and competitive environment for all parties.
Index.characteristics_description: During the bidding phase, only one hash is sent with the bid. Then there is a reveal phase where the hash is compared with the real information, and it is verified that it is the correct information.
Index.characteristics_description2: Through blockchain technology the reveal is made public, transparent and immutable.
Index.characteristics_description3: In cases of disputes or claims. We integrate Kleros, where experts make impartial decisions.
Index.newsletter_description: We will only send content from time to time, making sure it adds value.
